About Thermo

Thermo was established in 1990 when designing the equipment for the coldest Swedish winter ever to be measured in history. In the winter of 1990, the temperature went below 20 degrees celcius, and people needed warm clothing for their everyday life. Ever since, Thermo has been developing high-performance thermo clothing for city folks and outdoor enthusiasts all over the world.

Happy shopping!
